alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:37PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:40 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 1.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.3 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 1.9 Tue 6 pm CST 2.2 2.1 2.1 &&
